articles.title: 2023 Ryder Cup schedule: U.S., Europe teams set matchups, pairings, tee times for Day 1 on Friday - CBS Sports
articles.description: Jordan Spieth and Justin Thomas will sit for the first session of the 2023 Ryder Cup
articles.content: The 2023 Ryder Cup is nearing its start, and just about 12 hours before play begins, the Day 1 pairings and tee times are officially (and finally) out. Most notable is that Zach Johnson mixed it up a… [+6655 chars]
